bug.short_desc: SeqAn is not built on s390/s390x

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: SeqAn is not built on s390/s390x because of missing BuildRequires packages http://s390.koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=1794173
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): seqan-1.4.2-10

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 23 development cycle. Changing version to '23'.
(As we did not run this process for some time, it could affect also pre-Fedora 23 development cycle bugs. We are very sorry. It will help us with cleanup during Fedora 23 End Of Life. Thank you.)
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/BugZappers/HouseKeeping/Fedora23
seqan-1.4.2-24.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-ba0a0f12ef
seqan-1.4.2-24.fc22 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 22. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-3ec038f6b4
